phases.objective: Remove Dashboard button and redesign filter UI layout

subtasks.description: Remove 'New Task' button from Dashboard view while preserving it in All Tasks and List views. Update FilterBar component to use card-based layout with grouped sections (search, filters, sorting, toggles). Add CSS for card styling, section spacing, and responsive breakpoints.
validation_checks: Visual verification: Dashboard has no 'New Task' button
Visual verification: All Tasks/List views retain 'New Task' button
Visual verification: Filter UI displays in card layout on desktop/tablet/mobile
Functional test: All filter controls work identically
